name: Muskan Foundation for People with Multiple Disabilities

address: 15 Prashanti, Opposite MHADA Building, Near Matoshree Bungalow,

briefDescription: Muskan Foundation for People with Multiple Disabilities is a school and therapy centre for children with multiple disabilities. Our children have more than one disability - i.e - the child is blind and mentally challenged or blind and spastic or Deafblind.
